name: Discogreement
description:
Requires an internet connection and phone to play. Discogreement was created and designed in 4 days for Sprint Week Winter 2017.

Discogreement is a local multiplayer disco dance strategy game that has players battling it out on the dance floor.

It utilizes the HappyFunTimes system, allowing up to hundreds of players to join in and use their phones as a controller.

Credits:
  • Designed by Team 32:
    • Programming: Kelan Li
    • Art and Programming: Marina Pimentel
    • Programming: Sebastian Scaini
    • Art: Karanvir Sidhu
    • Art: Katie Lei
  • Music: Miami Slice
  • Announcer: Peter Francis
